A overall fun experience, was my introduction into the survival horror game genre

Highly recommend this game if your taking a time off reality and be in another one , 

fun with friends , 

it can take time to get used to from the heart beats and terrifying chasing sounds, but if you get used to , its fun
very interesting and addicting, best with friends as a survivor!
碰到印度队友，忍不住想吐槽。一局下来我一个人修了4台半的电机，全程从0%开始修，然后队友一台没修，全程白给，我都不敢相信这居然是红段的局，最后还被菜鸡队友卖了。

Oh boy DBD, where to start?  This game is fantastic, it's terrible.  The community is difficult to come to terms with and the devs are not the best, however the gameplay is tried and true at this point.  The perks are imbalanced but that's the point.  Not all perks can be super strong, yet they can be useful in other ways.  Maps are fun and moderately balanced about 80% of the maps are survivor sided.  Ranks don't mean much at this point considering some of the killers you may face.  The base characters are all evenly balanced and backstories and lore are great.  Servers are really stable and you dont come across many cheaters now adays.  All in all the game is good if you are fine with a stiff challenge as you go on.
Tres bien le jeu quand tu est soloQ et avec des amis trop cool
e muito bom e divertido de jogar com os amigos minha opniao melhor jogo de terror online no mundo todo <3
GREAT GAME FROM TEAM PLAY IF YOU THINK YOURE GOING TO SOLO QUEUE FOR SURVIVOR YOUR ARE SADLY WRONG YOU WONT NEVER WIN A MATCH WITHOUT TEAM PLAY
spend the time to learn and you wont regret it. WARNING: if you get mad easily and arent willing to admit defeat, dont try this.
big learning curve.. after you understand most of it, one of the best

this is the most inconsistent, worthless, trash game ive ever played. its super fricken addicting but is absolutely all luck, no matter how good you get the game will always screw you over on both sides. you get hit through pallets and windows constantly as survivor and you swing right through survivors as killer. do not purchase this game, it is not a horror experience its a rage game on the same level as surgeon simulator but with none of the charm

Bethesda puts together less buggy games and thats literally what they are know for. this is what happens when a bunch of goldfish get put in a room with type writers, yeah they made a pretty game but its rotton on the inside. the best part is that every time you fail the toxic community will swoop in to bully for things you had no control over. what a horrible, soul draining experience.

Dead by daylight is a phenomenal game. It's spooky, the replayability is great, there are plenty of additions you can get if you so choose, but it's a ton of fun. A glorified version of manhunt, but in the best way possible. At night with the lights off is the best!
if you have a squad this game even if is horror can be funny

eng:

this is my favourite game. this is good game and i enjoy everytime when i play this.
I love this game I went from playing many shooter games to being stuck on this. The best part is me knowing i am improving on tactics very fun really recommend.

El juego es muy entretenido. Podes utilizar asesinos clásicos de la cultura pop y jugar con tus amigos. Al principio puede ser casual pero al ir dominando los loopeos y las tecnicas de huida el juego ira cobrando mas sentido y comenzas a viciarte. Lo único malo es que no esta bien optimizado, le exige mucho a la placa de video cuando realmente no lo necesita. Mas allá de eso esta buenisimo. Recomendado.

Although the community is so toxic sometimes you could melt gold with it, It's enjoyable to play killer, despite the survior meta, because you get to take their grin from their teabagging faces and shove it up their ugly butt.
ахуенная игра, рекомендую если тебе нравится убегать нахуй

Don´t even start playing this game. You will love and hate ist. 

I´ve never seen such a shitload of bugs in a single game, and they last for months or even years. The hitboxes are terrible for over a year now, mapdesign is gross, Balance does not exist. Every 3 months a new dlc comes out, bringing new bugs and some old ones back.
The community is pretty toxic though.

So lets talk Dead by Daylight... whenever they update the game they add new bugs... hitboxes are a joke... they add dc penalties which is fine except when you dc against a tunneler or camper... some of the killers are no fun to play against or fun to play at all and the devs rarely change them or buff them if they do its once while the character is new so they nerf them to death or buff them to the point they arent fun to play against... my sack has more brains than the community sometimes... you play as a brain dead killer who stares at their weapon for an hour when they hit someone or they are too dumb to step over pallets or a puss group of survivors whose only hope is a couple of pallets that may be safe may not be... the ranking system is pointless and mostly inaccurate... but im addicted so please spend money on game :)

Scary at first, methodical later. Yes, your teammates can carry or drag you down. You'll rank up if you stick to maxing out your objectives regardless of the survival points. 
Matches feel more tense as killer because of time efficiency.

Final Review: Uninstalled. Most of the time, you won't get a fair matchmaking as a killer. Why not just play as a survivor? Because the game forces you to play as a killer with the killer dailies and easier mission for killers.
-
It matchmakes Intermediate/Beginner Killer vs Top Survivors. Very discouraging for the new players (killer mains especially) who just want to learn little by little. But no, it places you in a game against very seasoned players.
